properties.name: amap.privateKey
properties.description: 高德地图私钥, 用于数字签名, 若不需要数字签名可不填.

properties.name: amap.digitalSignatureEnable
properties.description: 是否开启数字签名, 如果为true需要配置私钥, 默认为false.

properties.name: amap.connectionTimeout
properties.description: 连接超时时间, 单位毫秒, 默认15000毫秒.

properties.name: amap.readTimeout
properties.description: 读取超时时间, 单位毫秒, 默认15000毫秒.
